${ModID}:TodoItem.NAME: Todo Item
${ModID}:TodoItem.FLAVOR: TODO: make this a sweet relic.

${ModID}:MonarchCrown.NAME: Monarch's Crown
${ModID}:MonarchCrown.FLAVOR: Heavy is the head that wears the crown...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, add a special #ystslib:Soulbound #rCurse to your deck.

${ModID}:BlueRose.NAME: Blue Rose
${ModID}:BlueRose.FLAVOR: "I'm not a heel... I'm a hero!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, set your #yumapyoi:Mood to #bAwful.

${ModID}:StandardTracenCleats.NAME: Standard Tracen Cleats
${ModID}:StandardTracenCleats.FLAVOR: A pair of well-worn running shoes, designed to withstand an Umamusume's training routine.
DESCRIPTIONS: Vigor the first time extra cards are drawn each turn.

${ModID}:ChampionGoldenCleats.NAME: Champion's Golden Cleats
${ModID}:ChampionGoldenCleats.FLAVOR: These once belonged to Tokino Minoru, a legendary Umamusume.
DESCRIPTIONS: Vigor whenever a card is created during combat.

${ModID}:Jukebox.NAME: Jukebox
${ModID}:Jukebox.FLAVOR: Listening to this makes you want to go full speed ahead. BAKUSHIN!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, randomly add a copy of #yTeio #yStep+, #yGolshi #yKick+, or #yBAKUSHIN!+ to your hand. It costs #b0 until played.

${ModID}}VoidedChequeTwelveBillion.NAME: Voided Cheque for Twelve Billion Yen
${ModID}}VoidedChequeTwelveBillion.FLAVOR: For some reason, looking at this cheque fills you with melancholy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 #rLate #rStarts into your draw pile.

${ModID}}JumboCutiePlush.NAME: Jumbo Cutie Plush
${ModID}}JumboCutiePlush.FLAVOR: She looks just like you, except she's more marketable and a lot less chaotic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle #b3

${ModID}}CarrotCupcake.NAME: Carrot Cupcake
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b10 Max HP on pickup. Improve your #yumapyoi:Mood by #b1 rank every #b
